scripts.start2: pm2 start bot/index.js --name Looty && pm2 start web/app.js --name eLooty && clear && pm2 logs Looty
scripts.looty: pm2 flush && pm2 delete Looty && pm2 delete eLooty && pm2 start bot/index.js --name Looty && pm2 start web/app.js --name eLooty && clear && pm2 logs Looty
scripts.elooty: pm2 flush && pm2 delete Looty && pm2 delete eLooty && pm2 start bot/index.js --name Looty && pm2 start web/app.js --name eLooty && clear && pm2 logs eLooty
